long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We expect pressing PageDown / ArrowDown scrolls the main page content.
However, it doesn't work if focus has been changed (e.g., you're typing in a text field).

This extension adds a simple action (can also have a shortcut key) to focus the main scrollable area back.
long.zh_TW:
我們一般預期按 PageDown / ArrowDown 可以捲動正在瀏覽的主要內容，
然而當焦點跑掉（例如：跑到文字輸入欄位去了）時是沒有效果的。

這個擴充套件新增一個簡單按鈕（也可設定快速鍵）來「聚焦」回主要捲動區域。
